scripts.bundle: .\node_modules\.bin\browserify .\src\root.js -o bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-stage-2 babel-preset-stage-3 babel-preset-react ] ]
scripts.watch-bundle: .\node_modules\.bin\watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-stage-2 babel-preset-stage-3 babel-preset-react ] ] .\src\root.js -o bundle.js
